verses.name: Job 20:22
verses.text: In the fulness of his sufficiency he shall be in straits: every hand of the wicked shall come upon him.

verses.name: Job 20:23
verses.text: When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.

verses.name: Job 20:24
verses.text: He shall flee from the iron weapon, and the bow of steel shall strike him through.

verses.name: Job 20:25
verses.text: It is drawn, and cometh out of the body; yea, the glittering sword cometh out of his gall: terrors are upon him.
